title: Group portrait of twelve teenage girls, and sponsor Mary Louise Bolden, from Kolesque Club wearing homemade plaid skirts and blouses, including front row from left: Geraldine "Gerri" Smith, Denise McGuire, Kathleen Douglass (Hurst), Joan Bruce (Griffin), Bette Scott (Hunt); second row: Elinor Bowles, Bobo twin, Jackie Smith, Joan Ryan, Beatrice Scott (Harris), Bobo twin, and Rebecca "Becky" West (Armstrong), posed on stage with roller skates and curtain with scalloped and ruched valance in background
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
